changes: Feature: Implemented 'Disable auto-hurdle' functionality, allowing users to disable automatic hurdling.
Improvement: Enhanced pause functionality by updating the main button text to 'Pause' or 'Unpause' based on game state.
Bugfix: Fixed an issue where the 'Disable auto-hurdle' setting was not being loaded from localStorage.
Bugfix: Fixed an issue where the 'Disable auto-hurdle' setting was not being saved to localStorage.
Feature: Added a 'Disable auto-hurdle' checkbox to the Gameplay tab and connected it to localStorage.
Bugfix: Corrected an import error by adding `highScoresContainer` to the exports in `dom-elements.js`.
Bugfix: Resolved an import error for `initializeUI` by creating a new `initializeUI` function in `js/ui.js` that encapsulates the UI initialization logic and is properly exported.
Bugfix: Resolved a 404 error for `version.js` by removing the incorrect import from `js/main.js` and hardcoding the version number.
Feature: Integrated `actions.js` and `drawing.js` into the animation logic.
Improvement: Centralized keyboard and touch event handling in `js/main.js`.
Bugfix: Removed duplicated function definitions in `js/game-modules/main.js`.
Bugfix: Resolved a syntax error in `actions.js` caused by git conflict markers.
Bugfix: Resolved a syntax error in `state.js` caused by git conflict markers.
